name: Rex the Oscisoldier
description: Rex is an osciloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With a sleek and classic design, Rex is equipped with sturdy arms and legs, allowing for agile movements on the digital battlefield. Its screen is adorned with a cute cat image, adding a touch of charm to its appearance. To complete its look, Rex wears stylish shades, giving it a cool and confident aura. As a soldier, Rex is skilled in combat and serves as a formidable member of the WebtrES club.
